Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0135 affecting package virglrenderer for versions less than 0.9.1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-0135 affecting package virglrenderer for versions less than 0.9.1-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package virglrenderer is earlier than 0.9.1-3, affected by CVE-2022-0135
